summary: This code sets the TypeScript compiler options for a project, specifying the root and output directories, target language version, module type, enabling source maps, and other configurations.

details.comment: This code sets the TypeScript compiler options for a project, specifying the root and output directories, target language version, module type, enabling source maps, and other configurations.
details.content:
{
  "compilerOptions": {
    "rootDir": "src",
    "outDir": "dist",
    "strict": true,
    "target": "es2020",
    "module": "ES2020",
    "sourceMap": true,
    "esModuleInterop": true,
    "moduleResolution": "node",
    "allowSyntheticDefaultImports": true,
    "declaration": true,
    "skipLibCheck": true,
  }
}
